name: .RKV File Extension
summary: Learn about .RKV files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: RKV files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the game packaged with them references them to load their game content.
However, gamers looking to modify content stored in RKV files can extract files from RKV archives with the RKV Mega Tool (it only supports RKV version 1 archives) and RKV Extract.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
